Run4YourBits

Class MultithreadSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • Run4YourBits.MultithreadSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MultithreadSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class creates a second thread in the application that runs simultaneously with other running threads, using the defined classes in the main method.
